string-array.name: section1
string-array.item: Do I understand what I need to do?
Do I need a SWMS for any \'High Risk \nConstruction work\'?
Do I need any Permits? (e.g. hot\nwork/confined space/dig)?
Do I have correct PPE in good\ncondition for the task?
Do I have the suitable tools and\nequipment for the task?
Do I have my vehicle parked\nappropriately?
Am I trained, competent, licensed\nand fit to perform this task?

string-array.name: section2
string-array.item: Manual Handling
Gravity
Mechanical
Electrical
Chemical
Pressure
Noise
Biological
Radiation
Psychological
Heat and Cold

string-array.name: section3
string-array.item: Risk(s) worked out?
SWMS completed
Safe to proceed

string-array.name: section2subheadings
string-array.item: Lifting, awkward positions, impacts, over-exertion
Slips, trips and falls and struck by falling objects
Caught in moving parts, struck by plant or flying objects
Electrocution from faulty tools or working close to live power
Inhaling, swallowing or touching acid, solvents or asbestos
Contact with highly pressurised fluid/gas or air
Hearing damage, masking of emergency alarms
Contracting diseases e.g. Hepatitis and Legionnaires
Exposure to radiation such as x-rays, sunlight or ultra-violet
Stress, voilence, fatigue, depression
Working with hot or cold objects or exposure to environment
